name: KG Equipment Service
tag_list: mig-welding, tig-welding, aluminum-welding, stainles-steel-welding, arc-welding, industrial-fabrication, welding-types, metal-fabrication, laser-cutting, truck-equipment, dump-truck-bodies, flatbed-truckstruck-accessories
overview:
KG Equipment Service is a welding, metal fabrication and laser cutting modern facility serving the needs of commercial and industrial businesses. We use traditional welding applications such as MIG, TIG, ARC, brazing and soldering on a daily basis. KG Equipment has mobile services to help with your facility maintenance needs. Our experienced personnel is proficient in steel, stainless steel & aluminum. Other services we offer is laser cutting, shearing, pipe-fitting, punching, bending, grinding, drilling and press breaking. We can repair, install and fabricate to your needs. KG Equipment offers you a variety of commercial equipment applications to fill almost any work-related need.

We fabricate to your design but pride ourselves on exceeding your expectations. We have the knowledge, expertise and resources to design and fabricate to your needs..

Visit our website http://www.kgequipment.com

Services offered: *Laser cutting *Welding:Stick, Mig, Tig and Arc. (Aluminum, Steel, Stainless) *Bending, punching, cutting and drilling *On site facility maintenance *Rigging services *Fork lift capacity (15,500#) *Truck Equipment sales and repairs (ex.bodies, hoist, liftegates) *Full line of Salt & Sand spreaders Any questions or ideas you want to discuss, feel free to call or email. services@kgequipment.com

Truck Equipment Sales & Repair Truck Equipment Sales & Accessories: Venco Dumping Hoist Venturo Crane and Crane Bodies Switch N Go Removable Truck Body System Anthony Liftgates, Tommy Gate Lift and Leyman Lift Gates RC Industries Tool Boxes Buyers Products Company Custom made Tool Boxes for Dumps & Pickup Trucks Donavan Enterprise Tarp Systems Custom Hitch & Towing Products

WELDING & INDUSTRIAL METAL FABRICATION SINCE 1983 We are ready to handle your next industrial fabrication project. A provider of custom metal products: accurate sheet metal fabricators / precision metal work. We provide Arc, Tig, Mig and Gas welding services for steel, aluminum and stainless steel.

All Metal Fabrication & Welding Shop working with aluminum, steel, stainless steel. Shape, tack and spot weld metal using MIG/TIG Welding, laser cutting, and more.

Metal fabricators in Bensalem, Philadelphia and NE Phila with Stainless Steel, Aluminum & Steel. Custom truck body, dump trailers, truck tool boxes for pickups, flatbed trucks. Heavy duty and medium duty commercial truck bodies for Conshohocken PA,Feasterville PA,Souderton PA,Franconia PA,Lansdale PA,Phoenixville Pennsylvania. TIG/MIG welding, metal cutting services for commercial and Industrial bussiness in lower Bucks Co

Metal fabricators in Bucks County,Philadelphia, Custom truck body, dump trailers, truck tool boxes for pickups, flatbed trucks. TIG/MIG welding, metal cutting services for commercial bussiness in Burlington County NJ, Mercer County NJ and the Tri State Area.

We are proud distributors of: Buyers Products Company Venco Hoist Venturo Cranes Donovan Enterprises Anthony Liftgates Tommy Gate Lift RC Industries Tool Boxes Buyers Tool Boxes Rigid Hitch Draw Tite Saltdogg Spreaders

WE SELL, INSTALLATION, SERVICE AND REPAIR TRUCK BODIES & TRUCK EQUIPMENT. We offer custom fabrication of bodies, hitches, toolboxes ,steps and ladder racks. We can alter your current truck body to meet your job needs. Dump truck rust repairs and truck bed floor replacements are no problem.
